import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav', templateUrl: './nav.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav.component.scss'] }) export class NavComponent implements OnInit { isCollapsed = true; constructor(private Router: Router) { } ngOnInit() { } public showMenu(): boolean { return this.Router.url != '/user/login'; } }
